testcase.name: Accessing deals
testcase.system-out: Given I am on CIMB page.....................................................passed When I select CIMB Deals....................................................passed And I would like to explore more for "Dorsett Grand Subang" under Travel & Fun.passed Then I will be able to see its details and other similar deals..............passed

testcase.name: Accessing & using Property Affordability Calculator
testcase.system-out: Given I am on CIMB page for calculator......................................passed And I navigate to Tools page from menu......................................passed When I access to Property Affordability Calculator..........................passed And I have inputted all necessary values as "1000000" "800000" "500000" "5" "800".passed Then I will be able to know the "2,189.85" and "108,000.00".................passed And I will see Credit Card Payment Calculator, Auto Financing Affordability Calculator and Property Monthly Installment Calculator at the bottom.passed

testcase.name: Accessing & using Property Affordability Calculator 2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on CIMB page for calculator......................................passed And I navigate to Tools page from menu......................................passed When I access to Property Affordability Calculator..........................passed And I have inputted all necessary values as "" "1000000" "4000" "9" "20"....passed Then I will be able to know the "0.00" and "0.00"...........................passed And I will see Credit Card Payment Calculator, Auto Financing Affordability Calculator and Property Monthly Installment Calculator at the bottom.passed
